pkgmetadata.longdescription: Prot - Pro Tools for Python 3[![Downloads](https://static.pepy.tech/badge/prot)](https://pepy.tech/project/prot)Modules------- * **classes** * **functions** * **converters** * **settings**classes Module-------------- * **Database** * **OptionsDatabase** * **Progress** * **ProgressBar** (from **Progress** and **BarWidget**) * **LockedDict** * **Str** * **TextListFile** * **Widget** >* **TimeWidget** >* **BarWidget** >* **TaskWidget** >* **CallWidget** >* **ValueWidget** >* **LoadingWidget**functions Module---------------- * **verifyColor** * **insertColor** * **getRandomPassword** * **testSpeed** * **getVarFromFile** * **checkMethods** * **callMethods** * **callMethodsWithArg** * **checkFileSame** * **splitStr** * **runAsMain** * **printMsg** * **printErr** * **printWarn**converters Module----------------- * **rst2html** * **dict2matrix** * **str2list** * **list2str** * **matrix2str**Packages-------- * **color** * **pip** * **progress** * **prompt** * **wcwidth**pip Package----------- >this is a Advanced pip Tool, this Package has a List of all pip Packages that you can Search, Download and Install them and you can Update this List anytime you want **Features** >* it has built in Packages List >* you can do an Offline Search >* can Create Offline Repositiry >* can do Batch Install or Download with built in List or use Custom List >* and more...
